responses.text: What can you tell me about the Xenoids?

dynamic_line: With all the craziness in the evacuation, we hardly noticed those strange alien soldiers; sometimes they were even fighting the zombies, but it seemed like it was merely to get to us.
You should talk to Randy Erikson, he's in the utility room.  I think he has some alien technology that he took apart.
Hopefully these xenoids doesn't kill us sooner than the zombies will.  Haha.

responses.text: Let me ask you about something else.
